NH Observations¶

If it fits, i sits stretch, or spot something, big eyes, big eyes, crouch, shake butt, prepare to pounce leave fur on owners clothes refuse to drink water except out of someone’s glass meow all night having their mate disturbing sleeping humans so refuse to drink water except out of someone’s glass.
